title: Paragon Machine Works makes a sippy stem adapter, modernizes thru-axle sliding dropouts
content:
Need another spot to hold a couple of water bottles? Paragon Machine Works’ 2h2o bottle cage mount attaches around the steerer tube, under your stem, putting one or two bottles in easy reach. It’s angle adjustable, so you can position them to slide out behind your handlebar and work around whatever length stem you’ve got

The post Paragon Machine Works makes a sippy stem adapter, modernizes thru-axle sliding dropouts appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
